activity.title: coronasafe/leaderboard#98
activity.text:
> @Ritesh-Aggarwal can we do this sorting inside getStaticProps()?
> 
> The order wouldn't change for a given day right, so let the server side do the computation and keep the client-side light.

I don't think that would improve performance as we have sorting/filtering parameters like show/hide core members, and many more in client side, so we need to have this logic in client side itself.
If we pre-calculate all the sorted arrays for every condition it may increase the size of page and nextjs recommends only passing required data in `getStaticProps()`
https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/large-page-data
